content:
from https://foundation.mozilla.org/en/donate/help/#frequently-asked-questions

How do I cancel or change my recurring donation? Can I change my payment method or my donation frequency? Access your donation portal here. Here you can cancel your gift or adjust the donation amount, frequency, date charged and payment method. If you run into any issues you can always contact us!


Btw this forum section you posted in is for support of the Thunderbird email client.
creator: James

content: Mine works fine. Beyond that if you want support you are really going to have to describe the issue. Why did you do something with POP? What is the error message you see when attempting to get mails?
creator: MattAuSupport

content: I have about a dozen email accounts in Thunderbird. It polls them for mail and gets it for them all. Notifies of new mail and shows unread counts in the folder pane. But beyond that I really don't think I understand your question.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
okay, so the answer is yes, that's great news.

I've been monitoring this account, works great. However, I added a "new" account, it acted like it took it, but it's not showing up. Maybe it's because of years of using Outlook or something, but I'd expect it to show up as another inbox...?

So I guess the expanded question is: How to make it see multiple accounts?
creator: jesme
